required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of LY03003 in Patients With Early Primary PD
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-centre,Randomized,Double-blind,Placebo Parallel Controlled Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of LY03003 in Patients With Early Primary PD

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the effictiveness and safety of Ly03003 following intramuscular injections

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to the end of the treatment period in the Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale(UPDRS)part(Ⅱ+Ⅲ)Total Score
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of patients whose total UPDRS decreased by 20、25、30percent or mors
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: UPDRS scale part Ⅱchanges relative to the baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: UPDRS scale part Ⅲchanges relative to the baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in SI scores in the Total Clinical Efficacy Rating Scale (CGI) relative to baseline,the scores of GI and EI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: To clarify the changes in PDQ-8 questionnaire scores relative to baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: To clarify the changes in PDSS questionnaire scores relative to baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: To clarify the changes in BDI-Ⅱquestionnaire scores relative to baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to the end of the double-blind dose maintenance period at 24weeks

intervention.description: During the intervention, the initial dose was 14mg, and then was incremented in weekly units, 14mg each time, until the maximum dose of 56mg set in this study was reached 4 weeks after titration, the optimal therapeutic dose or the maximum tolerated dose was entered into the dosing maintenance period. After entering the maintenance period, no dose adjustment was performed, and the stable dose was maintained for 24 weeks

During the intervention,the initial does was 14mg,and then was incremented in weekly units,14mg each time,until the maximum does of 56mg set in this study was reached 4 weeks after titration,the optimal therapeutic does or the maximum tolerated does was entered into the dosing maintenance period.After entering the maintenance period,no does adjustment was performed,and the stable does was maintained for 24 weeks.
